elytra-table-enchantment.config.title: Elytra Table Enchantment Config
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.elytra-ta: This mod allows Elytra to be enchanted using the Enchanting Table and the Anvil, and makes Elytra enchantments fully functional.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.elytra-table-: A mod that allows enchanting Elytra like armor.
